about:
I’m currently pursuing a MS in Computer Science at UC Davis. I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from Lahore University of Management Sciences (LUMS). As a software engineer, I have a strong foundation in both full-stack web development and mobile app development, with technical skills in JavaScript, Python, React, Node.js, and Flutter. 

 At present, I'm interning at iHerb, LLC, where I contribute to the Transportation Management System team, focusing on optimizing and enhancing transportation management solutions. I'm passionate about technology and innovation, and I'm driven to make a positive impact in the field of software engineering. 

 When I'm not coding or studying, I immerse myself in the world of anime. Feel free to connect with me to discuss technology, innovation, or anime!
name: Zeerak Babar
title: Software engineer & FullStack Developer
